page.title: 03Tavistock Food Shops.
page.content: The{delicatessen}of "Creber's" opened in 1881.Little has been changed since then.Originally it was only one shop, but recently it has expanded.Creber's has been a{family business}for several generations.Nowadays Creber's is well known, even to the extent of supplying regular orders to Malta, Australia and America.It is particularly famed for coffee,cheese and wine.The reason that Creber's is succesful is its friendly service and the quality of food provided. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * A new {supermarket }is being constructed. Our survey found a majority of residents against this as there are five supermarkets already. The new supermarket is badly sited and could prove hazardous to traffic until such time as the Tavistock by-pass decision is reached.
